DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine tolerability interleukin-11 ( IL-11 ) filgrastim ( G-CSF ) patient non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma , Hodgkin 's disease , breast cancer , solid tumor . II . Evaluate ability collect CD34 cell number apheresis collection require reach target number CD34 cell patient population . III . Evaluate time recovery platelet neutrophils number platelet red blood cell transfusion require follow IL-11 G-CSF mobilize peripheral blood stem cell infusion patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive interleukin-11 ( IL-11 ) subcutaneously ( SQ ) day 1-10 filgrastim ( G-CSF ) SQ day 4-10 . Patients undergo peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) collection day 7-10 target number cell achieve maximum 4 collection . Patients follow transplantation . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30 patient accrue study within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis nonHodgkin 's lymphoma , Hodgkin 's disease , breast cancer , solid tumor eligibility FHCRC/PSOC protocol involve autologous peripheral blood stem cell transplantation No evidence bone marrow disease No pericardial effusion , pleural effusion , ascites No CNS involvement Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 70 Menopausal status : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Absolute neutrophil count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great 2.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) SGOT great 2.5 time ULN Renal : Creatinine great 2.0 mg/dL No medically unmanageable , severe hypokalemia Cardiovascular : No history atrial arrhythmia congestive heart failure No history thromboembolic disease , except successfully treat catheter relate thrombosis LVEF least 45 % Other : No active infection require systemic antibiotic HIV negative No known allergy murine E. coli proteins No documented prior anaphylactic reaction interleukin11 filgrastim ( GCSF ) No papilledema No history Factor V Leiden defect , factor II , antithrombin III , Protein C Protein S deficiencies Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : See Disease Characteristics Chemotherapy : No prior cumulative dose doxorubicin great 300 mg/m2 At least 3 week since prior chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : No concurrent estrogen supplementation Radiotherapy : No prior radiotherapy pelvic area Surgery : Not specify Other : No chronic diuretic therapy At least 1 week since prior aspirin anticoagulant except low dose anticoagulation prevent catheter thrombosis
